PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ConcreteElementGeneral
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: General properties common to different types of concrete elements. The Pset can be used by a number of subtypes of IfcBuildingElement.

PropertyDef.Name: StructuralClass
PropertyDef.Definition: The structural class defined for the concrete structure (e.g. '1').

PropertyDef.Name: EnvironmentalClass
PropertyDef.Definition: The environmental class for the concrete structure (e.g. 'Y1')

PropertyDef.Name: FireRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire rating given according to the national fire safety classification

PropertyDef.Name: ServiceLife
PropertyDef.Definition: Expected service life (usually measured in years)

PropertyDef.Name: LifeCycleEnvironmentalLoad
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of the life-cycle environmental load

PropertyDef.Name: DimensionalAccuracyClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification designation of the dimensional accuracy requirement according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: ConstructionToleranceClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification designation of the on-site construction tolerances according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: ConstructionType
PropertyDef.Definition: Designator for whether the concrete element is constructed on site or prefabricated. Allowed values are: 'Insitu' vs 'Precast'

PropertyDef.Name: ConcreteCoverAtMainBars
PropertyDef.Definition: The protective concrete cover at the main reinforcing bars according to local building regulations.

PropertyDef.Name: ConcreteCoverAtLinks
PropertyDef.Definition: The protective concrete cover at the reinforcement links according to local building regulations.
